projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.movieTicketBookingDescription: The web-based Movie Ticket Booking System using Yii2 (PHP), enables users to browse movies, check seat availability, and book tickets online, with admin functionality for managing theaters, movies, and reservations.
projects.movieFinderDescription: The Movie Finder App integrates the TMDB API to enable movie searches, display trending titles, and detailed movie information while tracking user search activity.
projects.allergyAppDescription: This app provides a straightforward answer to the amount of allergy medication that is required for a day. It integrates data from the Ambee and OpenWeatherMap APIs to accurately calculate daily pollen concentration levels and temperature.
